DOC.brief_summary: - To evaluate the feasibility of combination chemotherapies comprising of gemcitabine-dexamethasone-oxaliplatin for patients with refractory or relapsed malignant non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL)
DOC.brief_title: Biweekly Gemcitabine-Oxaliplatin and Dexamethasone for Relapsed/Refractory Malignant Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: - The feasibility will be evaluated in terms of objective response rate, efficacy of stem cell collection, disease-free survival, and overall survival.
